The Class CconnectToServer.
This class is used to form a secure connection between server and client

mContext

public static Context mContext
Static variable for storing the Context. This context variable is used for reading the certificate file.

connect

public String connect(String... arg0)
connect is for forming the secure connection between server and android, sending and receiving of the data.

Parameters:
arg0 - data which is to be sent to server.
Returns:
data in string format, received from the server.

getDataSig

private String getDataSig(PrivateKey key,
                          String data)
                   throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                          InvalidKeyException,
                          SignatureException
Returns the string formatted digital signature for the data.

Parameters:
key - Private key for signing the data.
data - Data for which the signature is to be generated.
Returns:
signed data with the provide private key.
Throws:
NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the specified algorithm is not available.
InvalidKeyException - if privateKey is not valid.
SignatureException - if this Signature instance is not initialized properly.

getDataValidity

private Boolean getDataValidity(PublicKey key,
                                String data,
                                String serverDataSig)
                         throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                InvalidKeyException,
                                SignatureException
getDataValidity is used to verify the digital signature of the received data. If the verification is true then true is returned otherwise false.

Parameters:
key - the PublicKey received from server.
data - the data received from server.
serverDataSig - the Signature corresponding to the received data.
Returns:
Boolean value.
Throws:
NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the specified algorithm is not available.
InvalidKeyException - if publicKey is not valid.
SignatureException - if this Signature instance is not initialized properly.

extractDataFromJson

public Vector<String> extractDataFromJson(String... arg0)
This method extractDataFromJson is used to extract the data from JSONArray

Parameters:
arg0 - [0]-JSONArray formated data, arg[1]-contains the tag name corresponding to which the data is to be extracted.
Returns:
Vector, array of values extracted.
